dt2.11:1.2_0: maggasaccena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā,
dt2.11:1.2_1: te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi sampayuttā?
dt2.11:1.3_0: Te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.11:1.4_0: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.11:1.6_0: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.11:2.2_0: purisindriyena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā,
dt2.11:2.2_1: te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi sampayuttāti?
dt2.11:2.5_0: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.11:3.4_0: domanassindriyena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …pe…
dt2.11:3.5_0: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.11:3.8_0: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.11:4.1_0: Upekkhindriyena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …
dt2.11:4.2_0: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena dvīhi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.11:4.5_0: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.11:5.14_0: kammabhavena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā
dt2.11:5.14_1: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.11:5.15_0: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.11:5.17_0: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.11:6.1_0: Paridevena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā,
dt2.11:6.1_1: te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi sampayuttāti?
dt2.11:6.4_0: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.11:7.3_0: domanassena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …
dt2.11:7.4_0: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.11:7.7_0: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.11:8.14_0: hetūhi ceva sahetukehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.11:8.15_0: hetūhi ceva hetusampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.11:8.17_0: āsavehi ceva sāsavehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.11:8.18_0: āsavehi ceva āsavasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.11:8.27_0: kilesehi ceva saṅkilesikehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.11:8.28_0: kilesehi ceva saṅkiliṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.11:8.29_0: kilesehi ceva kilesasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā,
dt2.11:8.29_1: te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi sampayuttā?
dt2.11:8.30_0: Te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.11:8.31_0: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
